definition: (used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor

sentences.english: Such a theoretical device would have a zero ohm output impedance in series with the source.
sentences.chinese: 这种理论的设备将有一个与源系列零欧姆的输出阻抗。

sentences.english: Make sure that the measured values are not more than the maximum permitted value of 200 ohms.
sentences.chinese: 确保测量值不超过200欧姆这个最大的允许值。

sentences.english: Using an ohmmeter, check the resistance between terminal 50 and the switch body.
sentences.chinese: 使用欧姆计，检查在电磁开关50和外壳之间的电阻。

sentences.english: Due to the ohmic resistance in the conductor some energy were lost in transmission.
sentences.chinese: 由于欧姆电阻在导体一些能源在传输中丢失。

sentences.english: Each of the bulbs has a resistance of 120 ohms.
sentences.chinese: 每一盏灯泡有120欧姆的电阻。

sentences.english: Most micro- ohmmeters and DMMs don't have provisions for setting the test current.
sentences.chinese: 大多数的微欧姆计和数字多用表都不能设置测试电流。

sentences.english: When resistance in the circuit exceeds 140 ohms , the reading is not completely dependable.
sentences.chinese: 网路电阻超过140欧姆时，读数就完全不准了。

sentences.english: Attach test leads to pins 1 and 2 and note ohmmeter reading.
sentences.chinese: 把测试探针连接到插头1和2，并记下欧姆表读数。

sentences.english: The resistance must BE calculated from the current and the resulting voltage drop using ohm is law.
sentences.chinese: 根据电流和测出的压降值用欧姆定律计算出接地电阻。

sentences.english: A conductivity definition for mixture is derived by solving the average for Ohm's law.
sentences.chinese: 对欧姆定律求平均，得到混合物电导率定义。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, OMRON assumes no responsibility for errors or omissions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如此，欧姆龙不承担任何责任的错误或遗漏。

sentences.english: The ohmmeter uses an internal current source and electrometer voltmeter to make the measurement.
sentences.chinese: 欧姆计使用内部的电流源和静电计电压表来进行测量。

sentences.english: This law is known as Ohm's law.
sentences.chinese: 这个定律通称为欧姆定律。

sentences.english: This paper introduces control system of sleeper maintenance based on OMRON PLC.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了以欧姆龙PLC为核心的轨枕养护控制系统。

sentences.english: Using an ohmmeter, check the resistance between terminal C and the field coil brush lead.
sentences.chinese: 使用欧姆计，检查励磁线圈电刷之间的电阻。

sentences.english: It said Omron supplies electronic parts to Honda and Toyota.
sentences.chinese: 报导说，欧姆龙为本田和丰田供应电子元件。
